title: Morgana Chroma Bug
body: I've owned the Morgana chroma pack for some time now. However, when I played Morgana earlier today i didnt have the option of using it. Usually the client shows that a skin (classic or not) has a chroma and I didnt even have that available to me. So i was forced to use the base classic. Can't say if this is the case for the other chroma packs, only noticed it for the Morgana set.

replies.body: The Chroma skin doesn't work in Team Builder at all. I've tried using it a few times and have never been able to except in AI mode. Money wasted Riot. :(
I was in Ranked Solo Queue. Also sorry for the late response, didnt get to check back until just now.

Hiya Wardism, 

Were you in Team Builder, or another queue?
